means: 使人极度伤心的，令人悲痛的

sentence.Network_en: I heard the most heartrending screams and moans.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到了最让人揪心的尖叫和呻吟。

sentence.Network_en: It is really heartrending to see his own child sentenced.
sentence.Network_cn: 看到自己的孩子被判刑真叫人伤心.

sentence.Network_en: Time dulls the most exquisite emotions and softens the most heartrending grief.
sentence.Network_cn: 时间会缓和最激烈的情感,减轻最伤心的悲痛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... hearten vt. 鼓起勇气,激励 heartrending adj. 令人心碎的；悲惨的 hedonism n. 享乐主义.
H开头的英语单词 ... 3.heartland：n. 中心区域 4.heartrending：a. 令人心碎的 5.heartstrings：n. 心弦，内心最深处的感情.
荡字的解释 ... 荡妇〖 vamp〗 荡气回肠〖 heartrending;soul-stirring〗 荡然无存〖 obliterate;withnothingleft;bedissipated〗.
红宝书hedlong_红宝书_新浪博客 ... hearken v. 注意地倾听 heartrending adj. 令人心碎的；伤心的 heavy-handedness n. 笨手笨脚.

list.abs: the heartrending words of Rabin ' s granddaughter ., 罗宾的孙女令人心碎的话语.
though i can leave this heartrending place ., 离开伤心的地方.
It is really heartrending to see his own child sentenced., 看到自己的孩子被判刑真叫人伤心.
the most well-known legend is the romantic yet heartrending story of the Cowherd and the Weaving Maid .最广为人知的传说是牛郎与织女浪漫却悲伤的故事。

entry.tran: 使人悲痛的;令人心碎的
entry.def: You use heart-rending to describe something that causes you to feel great sadness and pity.

example.ex: I heard the most heartrending screams and moans.
example.tran: 我听到了最让人揪心的尖叫和呻吟。

means.word_mean: 1. causing or marked by grief or anguish;

auth_sentence.content: The human tragedy has been heartrending.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The human tragedy has been heartrending.

auth_sentence.content: Friedrich did not assume that heartrending, stomach-turning pictures would speak for themselves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Friedrich did not assume that heartrending, stomach-turning pictures would speak for themselves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Friedrich did not assume that heartrending, stomach-turning pictures would speak for themselves.

auth_sentence.content: It's on the heartrending conclusion of Lost in the World that West cements his vision and paints a sonic world to call his own.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's on the heartrending conclusion of Lost in the World that West cements his vision and paints a sonic world to call his own.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's on the heartrending conclusion of Lost in the World that West cements his vision and paints a sonic world to call his own.

means.word_mean: 使人极度伤心的,令人悲痛的
